meta.videoTitle: How to Prevent & Treat Colds & Flu

text_en: In a world where colds and flu are common ailments that can impact our daily lives, understanding how to prevent and treat them is essential. Today, we delve into the science behind colds and flu, exploring their effects on the body and brain. We will discuss evidence-based techniques for avoiding these viruses and strategies for recovering faster if you do fall ill. By gaining insight into how our immune system functions, we empower ourselves to make informed choices in bolstering our defenses against colds and flu. Join us on this journey as we debunk common myths and explore practical tools and compounds that can help keep these illnesses at bay.
text_zh: 在一个常见感冒和流感的世界里，这些常见病症可能会影响我们的日常生活，了解如何预防和治疗它们是至关重要的。今天，我们深入探讨感冒和流感背后的科学，探究它们对身体和大脑的影响。我们将讨论基于证据的避免这些病毒以及在感染后更快恢复的技巧。通过了解我们的免疫系统如何运作，我们赋予自己能力做出明智的选择，增强我们对抗感冒和流感的防御力。加入我们一起来揭穿常见的谬论，探索实用的工具和化合物，帮助我们防范这些疾病。
